description:
Natsumi`s been cast as Wendy in Peter Pan, and she is a horrible actor.  Keroro tries to give her acting lessons, but there`s not much he can do when she suddenly freezes on stage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: April et Enéa ou la passion du théâtre / Keroro, info ou intox
Natsumi & Koyuki Butai ni Kakeru Seishun de Arimasu / Keroro Scoop wa NG! de Arimasu
夏美&小雪 舞台にかける青春 であります / ケロロ スクープはNG! であります
